title: Hello! This is customer support. How can I assist you today?
I can help with your order. What would you like to know?
I'll help you with shipping information.
I can guide you through returns and exchanges.
Please provide your order number. You can also check your order status in your account dashboard.
If your order hasn't shipped yet, we can cancel it. Please provide your order number.
Order modifications are possible before shipping. Please call our support line for immediate assistance.
You can track your package using the tracking number from your order confirmation email.
Address changes are possible before shipping. For urgent requests, please call us directly.
Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery. Please use our online return form to get started.
For defective items, we offer free exchanges. Please describe the issue with your product.
